name: High-cost Angiotensin-II Receptor Blockers (ARBs)
title: Prescribing of high-cost Angiotensin-II Receptor Blockers (ARBs)
as a percentage of prescribing of all ARBs
description: as a percentage of prescribing of all ARBs.
See the full list of BNF codes used in this measure.
why_it_matters: Various angiotensin-II receptor blockers (ARBs) are available. A number of them are now available generically, and are of low cost.
NICE guidance for treating high blood pressure recommends that the low-cost versions should be used.
